item.title: Hello World!
item.description: 2017 has been the most intense year in my life so far. Taught me a hell lot of new things. Things went wrong in ways I had never even thought of. And things started to get right again after I learned to focus on the right things. Now I know.. Things go wrong for a reason. I’m more awake and less day dreaming. More realistic, yet optimistic. I’m alive.
